page.title: 04Aylesford High School
page.content: I am Samantha, age 13, completing my final term in the Second Year. About 1000 children attend my school, a number of whom travel from outlying villages by School Bus. Main lessons are graded but registration and practical lessons are taken in mixed ability groups. The school comprises three main blocks: Maths & Computer; Art, Science and Metalwork; and English - which also contains the Hall and Gym. Also we have 19 huts and 4 mobile classrooms. During the recent Teachers' dispute several of the staff took strike action. The Headmaster told pupils to treat the unexpected free days as "working holidays". He was optimistic! In general we are a happy school and appear to maintain a high standard of examination results. -Samantha D.-
